snippet: LeBron James scored 25 points against his former team, leading the host Miami Heat to a victory over the Cleveland Cavaliers.
abstract: NBA Roundup; Miami Heat beat Cleveland Cavaliers, 114-107; other basketball scores noted.
lead_paragraph: LeBron James scored 25 points against his former team, leading the host Miami Heat to a victory over the Cleveland Cavaliers.

headline.main: James Helps Heat Hold Off Cavaliers
headline.print_headline: James Helps The Heat Hold Off The Cavs
